diff_act: 2.enter train data automatically via communication with external systems

regen.absent_element: confirmation of manually entered or overwritten train data by the driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall require the driver to confirm manually entered or overwritten train data before it is stored in the ETCS equipment.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
